page.title: 03WOLLATON HALL
page.content:
One night, me and my friend went to {Wollaton Hall}to interview a man who worked there. We asked him if they had ever got to the museum and found anything missing. He said they had not had anything missing or they would not be doing their job properly.
Then we asked him if he had any strange stories to tell us about the museum. He said, 'Yes. Two of the people that worked there heard someone talking. All the doors were locked and they went down the stairs, but nobody was there.
Then we asked him if he had any more stories. He said, 'No'
